@@ -1,20 +1,19 @@
 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <project version="4">
+  <component name="GradleMigrationSettings" migrationVersion="1" />
   <component name="GradleSettings">
     <option name="linkedExternalProjectsSettings">
       <GradleProjectSettings>
         <option name="testRunner" value="PLATFORM" />
         <option name="distributionType" value="DEFAULT_WRAPPED" />
         <option name="externalProjectPath" value="$PROJECT_DIR$" />
-        <option name="gradleJvm" value="1.8 (2)" />
         <option name="modules">
           <set>
             <option value="$PROJECT_DIR$" />
             <option value="$PROJECT_DIR$/app" />
           </set>
         </option>
         <option name="resolveModulePerSourceSet" value="false" />
-        <option name="useQualifiedModuleNames" value="true" />
       </GradleProjectSettings>
     </option>
   </component>

@@ -0,0 +1,54 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/input"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:textColor="#FFFF00"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/textViewSize"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.362"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
+        tools:visibility="visible" />
+
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/output"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:textColor="#FFFF00"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/textViewSize"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.361"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.046"
+        tools:visibility="visible" />
+
+    <include
+        layout="@layout/keyboard_grid"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_gravity="bottom"
+        android:layout_marginStart="32dp"
+        android:layout_marginTop="554dp"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="32dp"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="320dp"
+        android:visibility="visible"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.919"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.651"
+        tools:visibility="visible" />
+
+</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -4,15 +4,51 @@
     xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
     android:layout_width="match_parent"
     android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:background="@drawable/background"
     tools:context=".MainActivity">
 
+
+
     <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/input"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/textViewSize"
+        android:textColor="#FFFF00"
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintHorizontal_bias="0.909"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintVertical_bias="0.252" />
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/output"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/textViewSize"
+        android:textColor="#FFFF00"

+<GridLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+    android:layout_gravity="center|bottom"
+    android:layout_marginBottom="124dp"
+    android:columnCount="4"
+    android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/buttonSqrt"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        android:layout_row="5"
+        android:layout_column="1"
+        android:text="@string/buttonSqrt"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/key_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/buttonLeftBracket"

+        android:text="@string/buttonLeftBracket"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/key_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/buttonRightBracket"
+        android:layout_row="0"
+        android:layout_column="2"

+        android:textSize="@dimen/key_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/buttonDelimiter"
+        android:layout_row="0"
+        android:layout_column="3"
+        android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/paddingLeft"
+        android:text="@string/buttonDelimiter"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/key_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button7"
+        android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/paddingLeft"
+        android:text="@string/button7"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/key_text_size" />
+
+

+        android:text="@string/button8"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/key_text_size" />
+

+        android:text="@string/button9"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/key_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/buttonMultiply"
+        android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/paddingLeft"
+        android:text="@string/buttonMultiply"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/key_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button4"
+        android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/paddingLeft"
+        android:text="@string/button4"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/key_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button5"
+        android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/paddingLeft"
+        android:text="@string/button5"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/key_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button6"
+        android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/paddingLeft"
+        android:text="@string/button6"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/key_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/buttonMinus"
+        android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/paddingLeft"
+        android:text="@string/buttonMinus"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/key_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button1"
+        android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/paddingLeft"

+        android:textSize="@dimen/key_text_size" />

+</GridLayout>

+<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
